preceding: Following identity verification failures, Lenart sees firsthand infrastructure chaos, leading him to frequent Bar 101.
dilemma: Lenart must choose between reinforcing the current centralized system or supporting a shift towards decentralized control.
reason: Lenart struggles between pride in his technical ability to fix the system versus a belief that the system's core issues require a fundamental change.
choice_a: Support technocratic purists by stabilizing AI-driven public advisories.
choice_b: Assist underground activists and civil reformers in exposing system vulnerabilities.
